active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group debate, argue whether TLS or IPsec is more effective against message modification attacks in mobile vs. enterprise networks. Use real-world examples (e.g., Wireshark-captured HTTP tampering) and reference standards like NIST Cybersecurity Framework and ISO/IEC 27001 to support claims, sparking critical thinking on trade-offs.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
